item.title: About
item.description: The Blog This is the second attempt to maintain a blog of my own. Once upon a time I had taken a domain and hosted a wordpress powered website. Then I gave up because I did not really think I had stories to tell. This time around, I think I do have stories to tell. Maybe this one will survive. The blog will mostly contain a more regular log of my travels and activities.
